// Add Marker
  var markerInstance = map.addMarker({
  lat: 41.3833,
  lng: 2.1833,
  title: 'Barcelona',
  data: {cityName: 'barcelona'}
  }, {filters: ['cityName']});

  // Update Marker Using Crossfilter
  var marker = map.findMarker({cityName: 'barcelona'}, {limit: 1});
	map.updateMarker(marker, {move: 'drop'});

  // Using instance
  map.updateMarker([markerInstance], {move: 'drop'});
